greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of numbers <= n which have common prime factors with n.
comment: Sum of k <= n such that gcd(n,k) > 1.
link: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(p) = p where p is a prime; a(2^k) = 2^(k-1)*{2^(k-1) + 1).
mathematica: Join[{0}, Table[n (n + 1) / 2 - n EulerPhi@(n) / 2, {n, 2, 60}]] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 19 2019 *)
program: (PARI) A067392(n)={a=0; for(i=1, n, if(gcd(i, n)<>1, a=a+i)); a}
(PARI) a(n) = sum(k=1, n, k*(gcd(k, n) != 1)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 08 2018
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Jan 22 2002
